document.full_text: greece laid out plans to sell stakes in key state firms and make further budget savings on friday but failed to quell fears of debt restructuring fanned by a german official's comments.
document.title: greece sell-off plans fail to quell debt worries
lines_and_colors: greece laid out plans to sell stakes in key state firms and make further budget savings on friday but failed to quell fears of debt restructuring fanned by a german official's comments.
